column3: Oh, are you a traveler? Let me be one of the first to welcome you to Tailfeather!
What kind of place is this?
What's it look like? I'm learnin' the huntin' trade, just like my folks! Now, I haven't actually <Emphasis>hunted</Emphasis> yet, but I've got my hands full just helpin' out 'round the camp.
Gettin' huntin' supplies, takin' care of the birds... Why, even now I'm lookin' over this fresh-caught chocobo. The other hunters say I ain't too bad with a bow, either!

Hunters from all 'round make this encampment their base. Some are here hopin' to make a fortune, others are here 'cause they got nothin' better to do. You meet all sorts in this camp─there ain't never a dull moment!

This forest is just teemin' with wild chocobos, and if you catch yourself a big one, merchants from Ishgard will pay buckets of gil for it! It's that thrill that keeps us goin' in the face of bandersnatches and dragons.
